features: CLEANSING FACE WASH: This gentle moisturizing cleanser washes away dirt, oil and impurities with no drying, aging after-effects. The sulfate-free facial cleanser calms and soothes, and the papaya face wash leaves skin looking radiant

DEEPLY HYDRATES: Known as nature’s ‘moisture magnet’, hyaluronic acid delivers intense moisture, infusing skin with healthy hydration. Our hyaluronic acid facial cleanser helps plump, smooth, and rehydrate facial skin for a youthful-looking complexion.

ALL NATURAL FORMULA: Packed full of powerful natural ingredients: Papaya gently cleanses and removes dead skin cells; soothing Chamomile boosts skin’s natural glow; Vitamins A & E lock in moisture and improve skin texture; and Lemongrass tones and firms skin.

DAILY SKIN CARE: For best results, apply the Hyaluronic Acid face wash daily. Pump a small amount of the face cleanser into damp hands and massage over the face and neck. Rinse the foaming face wash thoroughly with water.

DERMA E: Clean beauty products that harness nature’s most effective ingredients. 100% vegan and cruelty-free, our eco-ethical skin care products contain no parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, petrolatum, lanolin, gluten, soy or GMOs, and are supplied in recyclable packaging.
body.description: Deeply moisturize skin while washing away dirt, oil and impurities with DERMA E Hydrating Gentle Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid. This ultra-hydrating facial cleanser is infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Chamomile, Lemon Grass and Papaya, plus antioxidant Vitamins A and E to gently cleanse and condition skin for a soft, smooth, dewy feel, and no drying, aging after-effects. Visibly reducing the look of wrinkles and dryness, the Hyaluronic Acid face wash exfoliates, cleanses and improves skin’s natural glow while also helping to fade blemish marks and sun damage for radiant looking skin. DERMA E’s Hyaluronic Acid face cleanser can be used daily. Pump a small amount of DERMA E facial cleanser into dampened hands, then massage the hydrating facial wash over your face and neck. Rinse thoroughly with water, and follow up with your preferred DERMA E moisturizer. KEY BENEFITS - Foaming face wash gently cleanses skin of dirt, excess oil and other impurities without drying. - The Hyaluronic Acid cleanser provides skin with luxurious hydration. - Ultra-hydrating face wash is deeply moisturizing and gently conditioning. - Promotes soft, smooth and hydrated skin. CLEAN, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS Packed full of skin-loving nutrients, Hyaluronic Acid infuses skin with healthy hydration; calming and soothing Chamomile works to boost skin health, helping to increase skin’s natural glow; Lemongrass tones and firms as it helps to remove impurities; Papaya is a non-abrasive exfoliant that helps remove dead skin cells and impurities, and Vitamins A & E are rich antioxidants and anti-inflammatories that work to improve the moisture and texture of the skin. DERMA E Hydrating Gentle Cleanser is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and does not contain parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, lanolin, gluten or GMOs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't irritate skin, gentle and very affordable
reviews.reviewText: I've been using all kinds of "natural" skincare products for years and I find Derma E is a product that I find that has great performance and a fair quantity for the price. This cleanser is super gentle and has never burned my eyes if it accidently was washed into the area. There's a scent but it's very subtle and not overwhelming. My skin seems to feel and look more moisturized after washing it with this cleanser. I use this twice a day and have never experienced dryness. This cleanser is very affordable and it's a brand that I can easily find at TJ Maxx or Marshalls for around $10. I like the bottle design too. The pump has never clogged on me and when it's time to pour some into my travel bottles for a business trip, it's not watery and it's easy to get every ounce of the product out. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, it leaves your skin so smooth & clean, I use it on my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle yet potent
reviews.reviewText: I really like this cleanser. I’ve been looking for a daily cleanser that doesn’t strip my skin. This is gentle and not too drying but still takes makeup off at the end of the day. I’ve bow purchased twice and love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great cleanser for normal skin
reviews.reviewText: I have normal skin which is an important thing to keep in mind, I only usually get slightly oily in my t zone and eyelids. I don’t know how this fairs for sensitive, oily, or combination skin.I was looking for a cleanser to help with my skin due to hormonal breaking out caused by my IUD, I saw one reviewer was in the same boat as I was and liked it so I decided to give it a shot! I honestly really love this cleanser!! It doesn’t really have a smell, maybe just a very slight bubblegummy smell but it’s really nice. It is smooth going on your skin, a bit foamy which I enjoy just because I feel it reassured me it’s working (lol), but once it’s dry it’s clear and unnoticeable. After rinsing it off your skin it does feel moisturized and clean but once you dry with a towel it your skin feels a bit dried out. Due to this I like to follow with the use of Derma-E’s ‘Vitamin E 12,000 IU Cream’ the texture is incredibly nice and it dries so nicely on your face if you’re planning to put makeup on afterwards while still really hydrating your skin. My only turn off to the moisturizer is the scent which is a melon-cucumbery smell but it only lasts a minute or so. I would recommend this product to someone in the same situation as me or that has normal skin with occasional break outs.**5 MONTH UPDATE**I originally thought this could help with my hormonal breakouts/acne but with continuous use I’ve realized that with hormonal acne this isn’t strong enough to fight against it. The name itself says “gentle” which I believe isn’t enough for hormonal issues. I’m planning to remove my hormonal IUD to know whether or not that is causing the breakouts or I will go see a dermatologist so I can get some customized strong acne products. No doubt this is still a great product that makes your skin feel refreshed and clean but it won’t do the trick for hormonal breakouts/acne. I bought it for that purpose and for that reason I’m giving four stars. This is best suited for someone who gets occasional breakouts and has normal skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great foaming cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! Been using it for a few years and have noticed the softness and change in the elasticity and texture of my skin. It foams well, is super soft and has a light scent. There is not any bad junk in it, & it was recommended by a make up artist that I was working with when I had wanted to change up my skin care due to aging. I also tend to remove my make up first, then wash my face with this. I use the Ultra Hydrating Hyaluronic Day cream and Night cream of the same line,& would recommend it to anyone wanting a change. I am super sensitive and break out easily, but have not had any issues with this Derma-E line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels great
reviews.reviewText: My skin feel so clean but not dry after using this cleanser. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it for the face, excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful for my skin
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love the Derma E line, but every product I have tried has been awful. This tried my face out and made it really sensitive to touch. It is itchy after using this product even with following up with moisturizer. I wish I could return this but unfortunately, it is a non-refundable item.
Beautiful moisturise face wash which is gentle and has a refreshing smell. Love using this on my sensitive skin and takes makeup off like a breeze

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 5, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for dehydrated, dry flaky skin
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser smooths out the skin, hydrates it and removes all make up. I wet my face and use one squirt of the cleanser, its enough to wash my whole face and neck. Other facial washes dry out my skin but this moisturises it and I do find hyaluronic acid is excellent for aging skin. Try it if you have dehydrated skin or the upper layers of your skin are dry and flaky with little bumps. It works wonders. Its also cheaper than other hyaluronic acid cleansers, good value for money. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 20, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Derma E Hyalluronic cleanser feels delicate on the skin. It is effective both in its cleansing and hydrating properties. A lovely product to wash the skin with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 21, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and as described.
